node.title: What we know about the Cleo Smith case and what could happen next
node.alt: A small child standing in an outback bush setting wearing a pretty dress.
node.description: Four-year-old Cleo Smith is recovering from her ordeal with her family, and the man police arrested after she was found continues to be interviewed by detectives.
node.content:
["The rescue of four-year-old Cleo Smith more than two weeks after she was allegedly taken from a remote campsite in Western Australia has captivated the world.", "The little girl is recovering from her ordeal with her family, and the man police arrested after she was found\u00a0continues to be\u00a0interviewed by detectives.", "He hasn't been charged, but here's what we know about the case and what could happen next.", "
Where did Cleo Smith go missing?
", "Cleo Smith was allegedly abducted from her family's tent at the Blowholes Campgrounds near Carnarvon in the early hours of Saturday, November 16.", "She was last seen by her mother Ellie Smith about 1:30am when she asked for a drink of water.", "She was reported missing at 6:23am shortly after her mother woke up to find she was not in the tent.", "", "
The Blowholes campsite where Cleo was allegedly abducted.(ABC News: James Carmody)
", "
How was Cleo Smith found?
", "WA Police carried out an intense investigation that led them to finding Cleo Smith alive\u00a018 days after she disappeared.", "The initial search of the campsite involved SES volunteers, Australian Defence Force personnel,\u00a0marine search and rescue volunteers and fisheries officers.", "A special 140-person strong team, Task Force Rodia, was set up in the first week she was missing.", "The WA government also offered a $1 million reward for\u00a0information that led to Cleo being found, or to the arrest or conviction of anyone involved in her disappearance.", "Police analysts examined thousands of pieces of information and data including CCTV, dash cam footage, mobile phone data and witness statements.", "The investigation led them to a home\u00a0on\u00a0Tonkin Crescent,\u00a0which is owned by the state housing commission, on the western edge of the town of Carnarvon.", "Police broke their way into the locked house about 1:00am AWST on Wednesday, November 3.", "They found Cleo in one of the rooms \"alive, well, smiling\" \u2014 the moment was captured by police body cam footage.", "", "
The police rescue of Cleo Smith was captured by body cameras.
", "
Where is Cleo now?
", "Cleo was reunited with her family soon after being found by police.", "She was then taken to hospital and examined by doctors.", "Assistant commissioner Col Blanch said she was\u00a0\"physically OK\" and was \"getting the best of care\".", "Police released a photo of Cleo smiling and waving from a hospital bed while eating an orange icy pole.", "Cleo was back at home by Wednesday afternoon, and the family spent the night sleeping in the same room.", "", "
WA Police released a photo of Cleo Smith in high spirits in hospital after being found.(Supplied: WA Police)
", "
Has anyone been charged?
", "No, however WA Police said a 36-year-old man was taken into custody after Cleo was found.", "Police Commissioner Chris Dawson said the man had no link to Cleo's family.", "The man in police custody was transferred to\u00a0Carnarvon Hospital by ambulance on Thursday morning.", "Screens were erected at the hospital's entrance to stop media from viewing what was happening.", "He was released from hospital but returned a second time.", "Assistant commissioner Blanch said the man had \"no serious injuries\".", "
What happens next?
", "WA Police are waiting to interview the man in custody.", "Police said they anticipated charged would be laid.", "They are also expected to interview Cleo in coming days, with the involvement of child interview specialists."]
